metadata.title: CVE-2018-10928 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in RPC request using gfs3_symlink_req in glusterfs serverwhich allows symlink destinations to point to file paths outside of thegluster volume. An authenticated attacker could use this flaw to createarbitrary symlinks pointing anywhere on the server and execute arbitrarycode on glusterfs server nodes.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
